synopsis.text: What keeps Neri Ooishi, a high school girl with a hidden volleyball legacy, from abandoning the sport she once loved? Despite her past triumphs as the captain of an elementary school team that claimed second place in a national tournament, Neri's resolve to avoid forming friendships and her self-imposed restraint at Hakuunzan Private Academy Middle School, a renowned volleyball powerhouse, hint at a deeper struggle. As she transitions into high school and joins a new team, Neri is presented with an opportunity to rediscover her passion for the game and prove her worth once more. Dive into the gripping tale of Neri's journey, penned by Nihonbashi and brought to life by Production I.G, as she navigates the challenges of competitive volleyball and the complexities of team dynamics.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
